dialogue.text: It's my first time touching the grass. It always looked so soft through the glass, but yet… it's so prickly
What am I supposed to do now? Wander around? Find shelter?
(stomach growling)
I guess that answers my question…
OH! (Cashmere Jumps out of nowhere)

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Hi there!
Uhh…Hi…
(He looks so happy.)

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: You look lost, do you need help?
Oh.. Um.. To be honest.. Yeah...

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Okay! Come with me! I'll help you! By the way, my name is Cashmere. What’s your name?
My name is ${name}.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Nice to meet you ${name}!
Cashmere brings you to meet the rest of the group.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: So here is my group!

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: This is Darius.
(He looks stressed out.)

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: This is Margiela.
What's with this guy?

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: This is Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart.
He doesn't look like he wants to be here.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: And last but not least, this is Calpico.
Pick a character to learn more about them!

choices.text: Cashmere
Margiela
Darius
Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
calpico
Continue story

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Hey, how are you? Have you gotten around to meeting everyone yet? Some may look mean, but don’t worry, when they get to know you, they’ll warm up to you!

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Surviving on these streets may be hard at first. My advice is to be nice to everyone and don’t be afraid to ask for help! You got this!

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: Hey there. What was your name again? ${name}? Not as cool as my name, but it’s alright I guess.

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: To survive in the streets you need to trust yourself and only yourself. How do you think i haven’t gotten any scars on my pretty fur?

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: I’m just hanging out with these guys because Cashmere begged me to.

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: I mean, I understand him, wanting someone as cool as me in the group is the best addition he could hope for.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Hiya! Name’s Darius! FOR NOXUS haha, get it?

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: My friends think I’m lucky for being able to survive this long, but really - I just do what they do.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: They’re cool, I love them! Sometimes they treat me differently, and I don’t know why - all I know is that they’re there for me when it matters!

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: *He looks at you and scoffs.*

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Hi, my name’s Calpico. Need the time? Need to know where to find food?

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: If ever you have any questions, come to me.

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Ask me anything, I know the answer. These other guys do the same thing when they need help.
A human approaches your group. They offer you food. What do you do?

choices.text: Eat the food immediately
Hiss at the human
Wait for the human to leave and then eat
Run away immediately
Refuse to eat at all

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: *Cashmere eats with you, enjoying the warmth of the moment*
*Margiela commends your boldness, saying you should dominate, not beg.*

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: *Calpico respects your cautious, calculated approach.*

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: *Darius follows, saying you can't trust humans.*

dialogue.speaker: Gangus
dialogue.text: *Gangus, watching from the shadows, mutters that it's dangerous to rely on humans at all.*

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: The sun is starting to set...

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Woah! It is! Cool find Margiela!

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: It is not that hard to notice Darius. You should be more aware of your surroundings.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Yes Calpico! You’re a smart fella!

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Honestly, today was really great! You’re fun to be around ${name}, I hope you’ll be staying around more!

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: *Grunts*

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Gangus says he thinks you’re cool!

dialogue.speaker: ${name}
dialogue.text: Thank you for helping me out!

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Do you guys smell that? Smells like the rain’s coming

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Uh oh, the sky is getting grey! We need to start finding shelter!

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: He’s right, quick ${name}, what do we do?
You look up at the sky and notice the big clouds coming your way. What do you do?

choices.text: Stay out in the rain, staring at the sky.
Panic, get lost, and sleep in an exposed alley.
Curl up in a cozy spot under a tree.
Find the driest, safest, and most structurally sound shelter.
Claim a dry crate and push anyone else out

dialogue.text: *Cashmere purrs, happy that you’re together.*

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Oh, we chose the same spot. Nice to see you again!
*Margiela smirks*

dialogue.speaker: Marigela
dialogue.text: Now that’s how you get what you want.
*Calpico nods, impressed by your logic.*

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Well Done. You learn fast.
Darius finds you later, relating to your struggle.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: You’ll be okay. Let’s go find the others.
*Gangus, from a distance, respects your discipline and endurance.*

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: I love the rain.

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: The sun is starting to set...

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Woah! It is! Cool find Margiela!

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: It is not that hard to notice Darius. You should be more aware of your surroundings.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Yes Calpico! You’re a smart fella!

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Honestly, today was really great! You’re fun to be around ${name}, I hope you’ll be staying around more!

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: *Grunts*

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Gangus says he thinks you’re cool!

dialogue.speaker: ${name}
dialogue.text: Thank you for helping me out!

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Do you guys smell that? Smells like the rain’s coming

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Uh oh, the sky is getting grey! We need to start finding shelter!

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: He’s right, quick ${name}, what do we do?
You look up at the sky and notice the big clouds coming your way. What do you do?

choices.text: Stay out in the rain, staring at the sky.
Panic, get lost, and sleep in an exposed alley.
Curl up in a cozy spot under a tree.
Find the driest, safest, and most structurally sound shelter.
Claim a dry crate and push anyone else out

dialogue.text: *Cashmere purrs, happy that you’re together.*

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Oh, we chose the same spot. Nice to see you again!
*Margiela smirks*

dialogue.speaker: Marigela
dialogue.text: Now that’s how you get what you want.
*Calpico nods, impressed by your logic.*

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Well Done. You learn fast.
Darius finds you later, relating to your struggle.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: You’ll be okay. Let’s go find the others.
*Gangus, from a distance, respects your discipline and endurance.*

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: I love the rain.
As the day rolls by and night falls, the sound of rain and cars driving through the streets near you keep you company.
Soon, you find your place and take your sleep; ready for the next day.

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: *Hisses* Leave! This is ours!

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: Yeah! We found this fair and square!

dialogue.speaker: Stray Cats
dialogue.text: This looks like a nice spot, would be a shame if something were to happen to it, don't you guys think?

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Nuh-uh.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: I'm sure we can all come to some agreement and find some common gr-

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: Leave!

dialogue.speaker: Stray Cats
dialogue.text: I don’t think I appreciate the tone there, buddy. See, the way I see it, this place could easily be our new home.

dialogue.speaker: ${name}
dialogue.text: Oh no!

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Guys, let’s talk it out, there’s nothing wrong with sharing, no?

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: What do you think we should do ${name}?

choices.text: Step back in the shadows, watching silently.
Panic and freeze, unsure what to do.
Analyze the situation and find an escape route.
Puff up and challenge them outright.
Try to de-escalate and talk your way out.

dialogue.speaker: ${name}
dialogue.text: We don’t mean any trouble, we’ve been staying here for a while and we have no intent on stepping on your toes, we all want the same thing, to survive.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Yeah, that’s right - we mean no harm, we just want to see tomorrow.

dialogue.speaker: ${name}
dialogue.text: Your stares mean nothing, come find out what we’re made of!

dialogue.speaker: Marigela
dialogue.text: That’s what I like to hear! We can take them on, easily.

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: I saw a gap near of the buildings where we can lose them.

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Smart, I don’t think these guys are worth the trouble, but I don’t think they plan on leaving us alone.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Are you okay, ${name}? Just follow my lead; I got you, hehe.
*Gangus respects your silent, calculating nature.*

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: Hmm…
With the strays out of the way, your group reunites to see what to do next, you’ve now come to an impasse: you’re hungry, and food isn’t being handed to you anymore. You need to hunt.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Well that was eventful. Hopefully something like this doesn’t happen again.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: That got me on my toes!

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: As long as we are away from them, we should be fine.
*Your stomach growls*

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Ruh-roh, someone’s a lil’ hungies, aren’t they?

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: I can’t blame you after all we went through today. Let’s try to find something to eat!

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: The wisest choice would be to go to the forest. There are a lot of rodents and birds we could hunt.

dialogue.speaker: Marigela
dialogue.text: ${name}, it’s your first time hunting. Follow my lead. We’ll get the best meal tonight.

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: *Grunts in agreement*
How should we hunt?

choices.text: Miss your chance, get frustrated, and sulk.
Refuse to hunt, preferring to scavenge instead.
Charge at the prey without thinking, relying on brute force.
Strategically plan and trap the prey.
Try hunting with Cashmere’s help, even if you’re clumsy

dialogue.text: Cashmere teaches you patience.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Cashmere: Just follow my lead, I’ll show you how easy this is.
Margiela laughs and encourages your confidence.

dialogue.speaker: Marigela
dialogue.text: Haha! Our hunt will be legendary!!
*Calpico praises your intellect.*

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Calpico: I like it. I didn’t think you had it in you. Look at you, using your brain!
*Darius sighs*

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Yeah, hunting sucks. Don’t worry, we can ask someone else to help us.
*Gangus respects your discipline and self-control.*

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: I understand it now… You’re like me, aren’t you?
One day, after weeks of adapting to life as a stray, something unexpected happens. A familiar scent drifts through the alley. You look up—and there they are.
Your former owner.
They kneel, calling your name, looking at you with guilt and sadness. They hold out a carrier, pleading for you to come back home.
This is your final test.

choices.text: Hiss and scratch, refusing to go back.
Observe them quietly, analyzing their sincerity.
Freeze up, overcome with anxiety.
Silently walk away without a word.
Run into their arms, forgiving them instantly.

dialogue.text: Ending: 'The Housecat's Heart' – You choose warmth and trust, hoping your owner has changed.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: It was nice to meet you ${name}!
Ending: 'The Untamed King' – You’ve found freedom and power, and you’ll never let anyone take it from you.

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: No one who throws you away deserves you.
Ending: 'The Negotiator’s Return' – You make your choice based on logic, ensuring it’s safe before trusting again.

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: What’s your conclusion?
Ending: 'The Ghost of the Past' – You’re haunted by the ‘what if,’ but the fear of being abandoned again stops you from returning.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: It's okay to be scared.

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: You already know the answer.
Ending: 'The Phantom Stray' – You refuse to rely on anyone again, choosing solitude over uncertainty.
